text: Peter Paul Igesumai (born 6 March 1982), is a retired Micronesian footballer who played as a defender. ==International career== Igesumai represented the Federated States of Micronesia at the 2003 Pacific Games. ==Career statistics== === International === {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !
